data.name: _AddRentalInitialPhotoNotice_
data.value: Please select your first photograph for this rental. Once your registration is complete you will be able to add multiple photos.

data.name: _PreviousTooltip_
data.value: go back to the previous step

data.name: _HomeAwayICalFeedInstructions_
data.value: We can automatically import reservations for this property with your HomeAway/VRBO calendar. Please Note -- this is a one-way procedure, meaning that we will pull your reservations from the .ICS feed but any new ones you add in our system will not be pushed back over. For further instructions and to get started, click the 'Setup' button above.

data.name: _HomeAwayICalFeedModalInstructions_
data.value: In the HomeAway/VRBO dashboard there are different types of 'Share Your Calendar' links. Make sure that you use the link for use with HomeAway as shown in the example below. When you have found the correct link, copy and paste it into this form.

data.name: _HomeAwayICalFeedLaunchModalInstructions_
data.value: Click here for an example of this link in the dashboard.

data.name: _ICalFinishSetupConfirmed_
data.value: Setup Complete -- Please Be Aware Of The Following

data.name: _ICalFinishSetupConfirmedBullet1_
data.value: This is an automatic import of reservations from HomeAway.

data.name: _ICalFinishSetupConfirmedBullet2_
data.value: Any door access codes will only be visible to the guest once the contract is signed, paid in full, and within 14 days of the reservation start date.

data.name: _ICalFinishSetupConfirmedBullet3_
data.value: Continue to add new reservations in HomeAway / VRBO and they will be displayed here.

data.name: _ICalFinishSetupDontForgetInstructions_
data.value: Click here to save your changes.

data.value: do you have a HomeAway or VRBO iCal feed for this property? enter it here

data.value: Departure should be later than arrival

data.value: Sorry but we could not find any suggestions for this category. Please try with another search keyword.

data.name: _NoPlaceSuggestions_
data.value: We don't have any suggestions for this category. We suggest that you use the 'Add Custom' button below to add some of your own.

data.name: _PreviousDescriptionLoaded_
data.value: We have copied your previous description for this place. You may save this description as is or edit it.

data.name: _NoOwnerSuggestions_
data.value: You currently do not have any suggestions for this category. To see our recommendations click the 'HomeAway Suggested' tab below. If you find something that you would like to add, click the green 'plus' symbol next to it.

data.name: _RelevantDaysInstructions_
data.value: Use the checkboxes below to specify which days of the week apply to this content.

data.name: _RentalNameTooltip_
data.value: this is what guests will call your rental

data.name: _VrboNumberTooltip_
data.value: do you have a HomeAway or VRBO number? enter it here

data.name: _WebsiteTooltip_
data.value: do you have a webpage for this rental?

data.name: _AddAnotherRentalTooltip_
data.value: Do you have another Rental to Add? Fantastic!

data.name: _ProvideLocalKnowledgeText_
data.value:
share your favourite things

Why did you purchase a rental property in this area? Was it the attractions, the beach, the bike trails, the skiing, the shopping, or the night life?

HomeAway™ will provide suggestions for all of these, but your Guests are counting on you to provide your advice. Take note of some of our tips, then add yours to the boxes below.

data.name: _FirstTimeUserText1_
data.value: This is where you can see the latest activity in your Hospitality Manager. Every time a guest does something or an email is sent, you’ll receive an alert here.

data.name: _FirstTimeUserText3_
data.value: This is your activity stream. Simply put, it tells you whats going on with your rentals. Anything and everything that happens is displayed for you right here. You can search by name or action and even filter by rental or type of activity. You'll see what suggestions people liked, what the guestbook entries look like and even

data.name: _FirstTimeUserText5_
data.value: Provide a benefit for Returning (eg. Returning Guests Won't Have to Pay a Cleaning Fee)

data.name: _FirstTimeUserText6_
data.value: Ask them to Sign the Guestbook

data.name: _FirstTimeUserText7_
data.value: Ask them to book next year's stay in advance.

data.name: _FirstTimeUserText8_
data.value: If something was less than satisfactory, ask for feedback.

data.name: _SearchByNameTooltip_
data.value: Can't see it below? Try searching for it.

data.name: _DescriptionTooltip_
data.value: tell the guests why they will love this

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText1_
data.value: Wonderful... Have a look at this.

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText2_
data.value: Upon selecting Checkout, or after their check-out date has lapsed, your guests are shown a Thank you Message. This is it: now is your chance to say thanks. We pre-populate one for you, but we'd encourage you to make it your own. Here are some helpful guidelines:

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText4_
data.value: Provide a benefit for Returning (eg. Returning Guests Won't Have to Pay a Cleaning Fee)

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText5_
data.value: Ask them to Sign the Guestbook

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText6_
data.value: Ask them to book next year's stay in advance.

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText7_
data.value: If something was less than satisfactory, ask for feedback.

data.name: _FirstTimeWelcomeText2_
data.value: This is a good place to welcome your guest, thank them for choosing you and let them know that you care and that their happiness is important to you. We pre-populate one for you, but we'd encourage you to make it your own. Here are some helpful guidelines:

data.name: _FirstTimeWelcomeText5_
data.value: Encourage them to take Advantage of all these amazing things

data.name: _FirstTimeWelcomeText6_
data.value: Request that they sign your digital guestbook

data.name: _NeedHelpContent_
data.value: Hover over the section of this page that you need help with. If you still have questions, click the black support tab to the left.

data.name: _AddContent_
data.value: If you're happy with the changes you've made, click this thing

data.name: _EmailConfirmationTooltip_
data.value: sorry, this bit is really important

data.name: _GYINextSteps1Text_
data.value: Write it down and keep it safe, it's an essential part of the 'logging in' experience ;)

data.value: Why did you purchase a rental property in this area? Was it the attractions, the beach, the bike trails, the skiing, the shopping, or the night life?

data.value: Start setting up your rentals. It's easy and fun.

data.name: _AddressInstructions_
data.value: The address for your rental is very important. We will use this to ensure that we provide the correct maps to the property and in making local recommendations.

data.name: _InstructionsHelpTitle_
data.value: Help guests to enjoy your place

data.name: _InstructionsHelpSubtitle_
data.value: you can improve your guest's stay... just tell them how

data.name: _InstructionsHelpText1_
data.value:
Take a moment to think of all of the bizarre questions that guests have asked you...then enter those answers in the boxes below.
Save both your own and your guests’ time with arrival instructions at their fingertips before their stay. Start by ensuring that the directions are accurate, describe the procedure for access when they arrive and let them know what you provide so that they can prepare for their stay.

data.name: _InstructionsHelpText2_
data.value: Sit back and take a moment to think of all of the random questions that guests have asked you.... then enter those answers in the boxes below.

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderFirstTimeWelcomeHeaderLine2_
data.value: Get started by adding information to help your guests to access, get settled into, and enjoy your holiday rental.

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderFirstTimeWelcomeBullet3_
data.value: Create a heartfelt thank you message

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningHeaderLine1_
data.value: There’s a better tool for your growing business

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningContent_
data.value:
Looks like your business is growing! The Hospitality Manager is designed to support up to 10 listings. As you acquire more properties, it becomes less suitable.

Fortunately, we offer a more robust option, with tools to help you manage your growing business. Learn more >

With GladPROFESSIONAL you can:

  • Manage dozens of properties easily
  • Seamlessly integrate with property management software
  • Provide guests with a custom-branded mobile app

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROPlugLine1_
data.value: After something more robust? The property manager level product, GladPROFESSIONAL might be just what you need.

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROPlugBullet2_
data.value: Seamlessly integrate with property management software

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROPlugBullet3_
data.value: Provide your guests with a custom-branded app

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROForcedLine1_
data.value: There is a better tool for your growing business

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROForcedBullet1_
data.value: Integrate with your property management software

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROForcedBullet2_
data.value: Customise the app to reflect your brand, and have your guests recognise your business by name

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROForcedBullet3_
data.value: Take advantage of full customisation in your integration

data.name: _RentalContentExportTip_
data.value: Export all content for this rental to JSON

data.name: _ExportContentModalInstructionsStep1_
data.value: This feature will allow you to export all content for this property in a portable JSON file format. In future versions of this portal you will be able to re-import these files. Click the 'Export Now' button to get started.

data.name: _ExportContentModalInstructionsStep2Part1_
data.value: This process may take a few minutes to complete. When the export is ready you will see a notification in the status bar of your browser to tell you that you're downloading a file called

data.name: _ExportContentModalInstructionsStep2Part2_
data.value: . Be sure to save this file in a safe location on your computer.

data.name: _ConfirmResyncMessage_
data.value: This will check all of your properties and guests for updates. You might want to do this if you have made changes or additions under the HomeAway dashboard that are not yet reflected here. This may take up to several minutes to complete. Are you sure you want to proceed now?

data.name: _ConfirmResyncMessageComplete_
data.value: We have reloaded all of your properties and guests. After you close this window we will automatically refresh your browser. This is to ensure that you will see the latest updates.

data.name: _ReviewsHelpContent_
data.value: This is the reviews hero unit

data.name: _FirstTimeThankText_
data.value: After their stay, your guests are sent a "Thank you" email. Personalise the existing message with your own voice. You can encourage them to write a review, ask if they have any feedback or if they want to book next year’s stay in advance. If you prefer to send your email through a different system, you can turn off this email in the "Settings" menu.

data.name: _FirstTimeThankTitle_
data.value: Show guests that you appreciate them

data.name: _FirstTimeLocalSuggestionsText_
data.value: No one knows the best spots around your home better than you do! Provide suggestions to help your guests discover the true gems that make your area unique. From restaurants, museums, and beaches to everyday necessities such as the the supermarket, the bank, or the post office, your recommendations will make staying at your property even better!

data.name: _InstructionsHelpText_
data.value: Provide your guests with helpful information to make the most of their stay: every bit helps, from how to operate the DVD player or coffee maker to which day the bins are collected. Think of questions you’ve heard from multiple guests and answer them in the appropriate category.

data.name: _WelcomeHelpText_
data.value: Welcome your guest, thank them for choosing you and make them feel more at home by adding your unique voice to our pre-populated message. Encourage them to take advantage of the content you’ve added to the app and make your message personal. If you prefer to send your email through a different system, you can turn off this email in the "Settings" menu.

data.name: _MyGuestsHelpText_
data.value: Here, you can easily view the status of each of your guests’ trips. Find a particular guest, see what content you still need to provide, enable access to your property, and re-invite guests to the Hospitality Manager. You can also follow up after their stay to request a review.

data.name: _RentalImportContentHelpText_
data.value: If you are an existing Glad To Have You customer, you can import your existing data here.

data.name: _ReviewsHelpText_
data.value: Take a look at some of the reviews you've received below. The newest ones will be visible once they’ve been moderated to ensure they meet content guidelines.

data.name: _MobileNotSupportedContent_
data.value: The HomeAway Hospitality Manager owner portal is not optimised for mobile devices. For the best experience, please login from your tablet or desktop browser.

data.name: _ModashFeedbackLeaveAComment_
data.value: I want to leave a comment for this web site

data.name: _ModashFeedbackParticipateInStudy_
data.value: Check here if you would like to take part in a future usability study.

data.name: _ModashFeedbackPlaceHolder_
data.value: Property reviews or customer service issues should not be submitted here.

data.name: _ModashFeedbackPleaseNote_
data.value: Please note that although we do read this feedback, we cannot respond to all issues.

data.name: _StartFeedbackOptionComment_
data.value: I want to leave a comment for this web site

data.name: _StartFeedbackOptionQuestion_
data.value: I have an issue or question and would like some help

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderFirstTimeWelcomeContent_
data.value:
Provide your guests with all the information they need…just when they need it!

With the Hospitality Manager, you can share helpful information – from entry instructions and Wi-Fi codes to local landmarks and activities – all in one place, and in your own unique voice. Your guests can easily access it on the web or via the HomeAway mobile app. Get started by adding information to help your guests access and enjoy your property.

Add specific information about your property
Customise your "welcome" email
Create a heartfelt "thank you" message

data.name: _FirstTimeLocalSuggestionsTitle_
data.value: Help guests to live like a local

data.name: _PreArrivalHelpText_
data.value: Provide your guests with any information they’ll need to know for their stay – directions, where to access the keys, any special things they should bring, etc.

data.name: _MyGuestsHelpTitle_
data.value: Stay in contact with each guest

data.name: _SettingsTravellerNotificationsHelpTitle_
data.value: Set which notifications to send to your guests

data.name: _SyncListingHeaderWelcomeLimitWarningPROForcedText_
data.value:
Hurrah for your growing business! You now have more than 20 properties. Unfortunately, that’s more than the Hospitality Manager can support.

We recommend upgrading to GladPROFESSIONAL, which is designed to help you manage a greater number of listings much more easily.

With GladPROFESSIONAL, you can

  • Integrate with your property management software
  • Customise your mobile app to reflect your company logo and information
  • Take advantage of full customisation in your integration

data.value: Your forthcoming guests will be invited to the Mobile Hospitality Manager on

data.name: _MyGuestsMoreAvailable_
data.value: Looking for a guest who is arriving more than 90 days from now? Use the search box above to find them.

data.name: _GracePeriodTopNagNoticePart2_
data.value: Update your content to provide them with the best experience. If You Want To Continue Where You Were Before Please

data.name: _AccessDeniedMessage_
data.value: There was a problem when logging you in. Please go back to the dashboard and try again. Please go back to the dashboard and try again.

data.name: _GracePeriodParagraph1_
data.value: Your list of forthcoming guests is not visible because they have not yet been invited. We will invite your guests on

data.name: _GracePeriodConfirmSkipmessage_
data.value: Are you sure that you're ready for your guests to start receiving notifications?

data.name: _PhoneNumberTitlesAddCustomInstructions_
data.value: Would you like to set a custom title for this phone number? Examples: Mary's Phone, After Hours Support Enter what you would like in the box below and click the Add button.

data.name: _GracePeriodDateNotice_
data.value: Your guests won't be notified until:

data.name: _GracePeriodConfirmUnlocked_
data.value: Your guests have now been invited. You will shortly see your guests in the My Guests tab and receive email alerts of their activities. Customise these alerts in the Settings tab.

data.name: _GracePeriodParagraph2_
data.value: Update your content to provide your guests with the best possible experience.

data.name: _GracePeriodParagraph3_
data.value: If you prefer to invite them now, click the ‘Invite Guests’ button below.

data.name: _InvalidWebsiteValue_
data.value: Must start with http:// or https://

data.name: _GracePeriodConfirmExtendedMessage_
data.value: Your grace period has been extended to ##EXTEND_DATE##. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.

data.name: _GracePeriodConfirmExtendMessage_
data.value: We understand if you would like more time to prepare. Click the confirm button below and we will extend your grace period to ##EXTEND_DATE##.

data.name: _GracePeriodExtendToolTip_
data.value: Extend Your Grace Period Time Period

data.name: _GracePeriodConfirmExtendConfirmToast_
data.value: Your Grace Period Has Been Extended

data.name: _SuggestionSaveToAllRentalsConfirm_
data.value: This will save this suggestion to ALL your rentals. Are you sure?

data.name: _ChangeLanguageMessage_
data.value: Please confirm that you would like to change language. This will allow you to enter multi-lingual content for your guests.

data.name: _SuccessContentSavedButDefaultRestored_
data.value: This area may not be left blank. Default content has been resotred and saved.

data.name: _ContentForLanguageMissing_
data.value: There is no content provided for this item in this language.

data.name: _InviteGuestDescription_
data.value: You can invite other guests staying with this reservation. These guests can do everything the reservation holder can do:

data.name: _InvalidContentNoticePicturesNotSupported_
data.value: We have detected unsupported content. In order to support all devices and off-line access - inline images are not supported. We have removed these pictures from your content.

data.name: _InvalidContentNoticePicturesSupported_
data.value: We have detected unsupported content. In order to support all devices and off-line access - inline images are not supported. We have removed pictures from this content. We have removed these pictures from your content.

data.name: _InvalidContentWarning_
data.value: We have detected unsupported content. In order to support all devices and off-line access - inline images are not supported. Please remove these images and upload them as photo attachments to ensure the best mobile experience for your guests.
